item.title: 欧洲 中国给了市场另一个欢呼的理由
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 西南航空公司将提出解决盈利问题的策略
item.description: 美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines）将于周四制定一项战略，以扭转其业务局面，并将利润率恢复到 "大流行病 "之前的水平，因为这家美国航空公司正面临着一位激进投资者要求其动摇管理层的压力。【原文：Southwest Airlines will lay out a strategy on Thursday to turn around its business and restore profit margins to pre-pandemic levels as the U.S. carrier faces pressure from an activist investor to shake up its management.】

item.title: 报价：第三季度并购不均衡，美国大选前并购放缓
item.description: 由于各公司在美国大选前推迟追求大目标，交易商们都在为第四季度全球并购放缓做准备，希望这只是明年反弹前的暂时挫折。【原文：Dealmakers are bracing for a slowdown in global mergers and acquisitions in the fourth quarter as companies postpone pursuing big targets ahead of the U.S. elections, hoping this will only be a temporary setback before a rebound next year.】

item.title: 第三季度并购不均衡，美国大选前并购放缓
item.description: 由于各公司在美国大选前推迟追求大目标，交易商们都在为第四季度全球并购放缓做准备，希望这只是明年反弹前的暂时挫折。【原文：Dealmakers are bracing for a slowdown in global mergers and acquisitions in the fourth quarter as companies postpone pursuing big targets ahead of the U.S. elections, hoping this will only be a temporary setback before a rebound next year.】

item.title: 澳大利亚赌场运营商 Star Entertainment 年度利润下降 71
item.description: 澳大利亚赌场运营商 Star Entertainment 周四公布的年度利润下降了 71%，这主要是受到监管限制收紧、运营费用增加和消费者支出疲软的影响。【原文：Australian casino operator Star Entertainment posted a 71% drop in annual profit on Thursday, hurt by tighter regulatory restrictions, higher operating expenses and weak consumer spending.】

item.title: 澳大利亚八月季度职位空缺下降 5.2
item.description: 在截至 8 月底的三个月里，澳大利亚的职位空缺连续第九个季度下降，由于劳动力需求降温，大多数行业的职位空缺都出现了下降。【原文：Job vacancies in Australia fell for a ninth straight quarter in the three months to end-August with declines spread across most industries as demand for labour cooled.】

item.title: 中国针对加拿大关税进行反歧视调查
item.description: 中国商务部周四表示，中国已对加拿大采取的限制性措施展开反歧视调查，包括对中国电动汽车、钢铁和铝产品征收额外关税。【原文：China has launched an anti-discriminatory investigation against restrictive measures taken by Canada including additional tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles, steel and aluminum products, its commerce ministry said on Thursday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚澳航称滚动式工程师罢工预计不会中断航班
item.description: 澳大利亚澳洲航空公司（Qantas Airways）表示，周四在墨尔本开始的、将在全国持续两周的滚动式飞机维修工程师罢工预计不会中断航班。【原文：Australia's Qantas Airways said rolling aircraft maintenance engineer strikes that began on Thursday in Melbourne and are set to continue for two weeks across the country are not expected to disrupt flights.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：中国考虑向顶级银行注资 1,420 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三报道，中国正在考虑向其最大的国有银行注资多达 1 万亿元人民币（合 1,423.9 亿美元），以增强其支持陷入困境的经济的能力。【原文：China is considering injecting up to 1 trillion yuan ($142.39 billion) of capital into its biggest state banks to increase their capacity to support the struggling economy, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国乐观情绪持续升温，亚洲股市不惧华尔街大跌
item.description: 亚洲股市周四逆全球趋势延续涨势，这主要是受到对中国积极刺激计划的持续乐观情绪的推动，尽管有迹象表明这种热情已开始消退。【原文：Asian stocks bucked the global trend to extend a rally on Thursday, fuelled by persistent optimism over China's aggressive stimulus package, although there were signs some of that enthusiasm was starting to ebb.】

item.title: 越南政府称 SpaceX 计划在越南投资 150 亿美元
item.description: 越南政府周四发表声明称，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司计划在越南投资 150 亿美元。【原文：Elon Musk's SpaceX plans to invest $15 billion in Vietnam, the Vietnamese government said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 美元大幅反弹后保持坚挺，美联储发言人备受关注
item.description: 由于交易员们期待美联储主要政策制定者在当天晚些时候的讲话中提供有关降息步伐的线索，美元在经历了 6 月初以来的最大幅度反弹后，于周四保持坚挺。【原文：The dollar held firm on Thursday following its sharpest rally since early June as traders looked ahead to speeches from key Federal Reserve policy makers later in the day for clues on the pace of interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 医疗保健公司 Guardian Pharmacy 在美国首次公开募股中融资 1.12 亿美元
item.description: 为长期医疗机构提供药房服务的 Guardian Pharmacy 周三在美国首次公开募股中募集到 1.12 亿美元，公司估值为 8.693 亿美元。【原文：Guardian Pharmacy, which provides pharmacy services to long-term healthcare facilities, raised $112 million in its U.S. initial public offering on Wednesday, valuing the company at $869.3 million.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行警告家庭在利率下降后不要过度借贷
item.description: 路透社悉尼9月26日电）澳大利亚央行周四警告借款人不要在利率开始下降时过度举债，以免面临繁荣/萧条循环的风险，尽管该行判断金融体系总体上仍有韧性。【原文：SYDNEY, Sept 26 (Reuters) - Australia's central bank on Thursday cautioned borrowers against taking on excessive debt when interest rates start to fall and risking a boom/bust cycle, though it judged the financial system remained resilient overall.】

item.title: 美国库存下降抵消全球需求困境，油价变化不大
item.description: 油价在上一交易日下跌后，周四变化不大，原因是燃料需求增加的迹象和全球最大石油消费国美国的库存下降，抵消了对其他地区尤其是中国需求的担忧。【原文：Oil prices were little changed on Thursday after falling in the previous session as signs of higher fuel demand and falling stockpiles in the U.S., the world's biggest oil user, offset concerns over demand elsewhere, particularly in China.】

item.title: 福特里弗鲁日工具和模具部门的 UAW 成员达成临时协议
item.description: 联合汽车工人工会周三表示，其代表福特公司位于红河园区的工具和模具部门的成员与公司达成了临时协议。【原文：The United Auto Workers union said on Wednesday its members representing Ford's tool and die unit in the River Rouge Complex reached a tentative agreement with the company.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，餐饮企业索迪斯考虑收购美国竞争对手 Aramark
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三报道，法国餐饮公司索迪斯正在探索收购其美国竞争对手 Aramark 的可能性。【原文：French food catering firm Sodexo is exploring a potential acquisition of its U.S. rival Aramark , Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 最新 HBM 芯片开始量产后，Nvidia 供应商 SK 海力士股价大涨
item.description: SK 海力士周四上午股价大涨 8.4%，此前该公司表示已开始量产 12 层版的最新一代高带宽内存（HBM）芯片，以满足当前人工智能（AI）热潮的需求。【原文：SK Hynix shares jumped 8.4% on Thursday morning after it said it began mass production of a 12-layer version of the latest generation of high-bandwidth memory (HBM) chips, to meet demand from the current artificial intelligence (AI) boom.】

item.title: 工会表示，罢工机工与波音公司将于周五恢复谈判
item.description: 代表数千名罢工的波音机工的工会周三表示，将于周五与该飞机制造商和联邦调停与和解服务机构会面，继续合同谈判。【原文：The union representing thousands of striking Boeing machinists said on Wednesday it will meet on Friday with the planemaker and the Federal Mediation and Conciliation Services to continue contract negotiations.】

item.title: OpenAI 主要人事变动
item.description: 据路透社周三报道，微软支持的 OpenAI 正计划将其核心业务重组为一家营利性福利公司，不再由其非营利性董事会控制，尽管另一名高管已经离职。【原文：Microsoft-backed OpenAI is planning to restructure its core business into a for-profit benefit corporation no longer controlled by its non-profit board, Reuters reported on Wednesday, even as another senior executive departed.】

item.title: JLR 斥资 5 亿英镑升级电动车工厂
item.description: 英国豪华汽车制造商捷豹路虎（JLR）周四表示，作为其电气化战略的一部分，该公司将投资 5 亿英镑（6.696 亿美元）支持其 Halewood 工厂平行生产电动汽车。【原文：Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) will invest 500 million pounds ($669.6 million) to support parallel production of electric vehicles at its Halewood facility as part of its electrification strategy, the British luxury carmaker said on Thursday.】

item.title: 聚焦：日本部分 7-Eleven 所有者厌倦策略，欢迎外资竞购
item.description: 虽然长尾淳不喜欢外国人收购日本公司，但这位前 7-Eleven 特许经营店主认为，收购将为这家他经营了几十年的零售巨头带来可喜的变化。【原文：As much as Jun Nagao doesn't like the idea of foreigners scooping up Japanese companies, the former 7-Eleven franchise owner thinks a takeover would bring welcome change to the retail giant where he spent decades.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，如果波音公司罢工持续，精神公司将在三周内开始裁员
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，如果其最大客户波音公司的罢工持续下去，Spirit Aerosystems 公司将在三周内开始裁员。【原文：Spirit Aerosystems will begin furloughs in three weeks if a strike at its biggest customer Boeing continues, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: Blackstone 确认投资 130 亿美元在英国建设人工智能数据中心
item.description: 英国首相办公室周三表示，私募股权投资巨头黑石集团（Blackstone）已确认将投资 100 亿英镑（133.2 亿美元）在英格兰东北部建立一个人工智能数据中心。【原文：Private equity giant Blackstone has confirmed a 10 billion pound ($13.32 billion) investment for an artificial intelligence data centre in the north east of England, the British prime minister's office said on Wednesday.】

item.title: American Eagle Outfitters起诉亚马逊侵犯 "Aerie "商标权
item.description: American Eagle Outfitters 周三起诉亚马逊网站，指控其在赞助商广告和搜索回复中侵犯了该服装和配饰零售商的 "Aerie "和 "Offline by Aerie "商标。【原文：American Eagle Outfitters sued Amazon.com on Wednesday, accusing it of infringing the clothing and accessories retailer's "Aerie" and "Offline by Aerie" trademarks in sponsored advertisements and search responses.】

item.title: 美国参议院投票决定追究 Steward Health 首席执行官藐视法庭的刑事责任
item.description: 周三，美国参议院投票决定以刑事罪判处 Steward Health Care 首席执行官拉尔夫-德拉托雷（Ralph de la Torre）藐视国会，因为这位高管拒绝就该公司申请破产前旗下 31 家医院的成本削减决策作证。【原文：The U.S. Senate voted to hold Steward Health Care CEO Ralph de la Torre in criminal contempt of Congress on Wednesday, after the executive refused to testify about cost-cutting decisions at the company's 31 hospitals before it filed for bankruptcy.】

item.title: 亚洲 随着中国刺激经济的作用逐渐减弱，"时间 "在向我们招手
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 辉瑞从所有市场撤回镰状细胞病治疗药物
item.description: 美国制药商辉瑞公司（Pfizer）周三表示，它将在所有获批市场上主动撤回用于治疗镰状细胞病的疗法Oxbryta。【原文：U.S. drugmaker Pfizer said on Wednesday it would voluntarily withdraw its therapy Oxbryta, used for the treatment of sickle cell disease, in all markets where it is approved.】

item.title: 消息人士称，社交媒体平台 X 将要求恢复在巴西的服务
item.description: 据两位熟悉情况的人士透露，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交媒体平台 X 将提交巴西最高法院要求的文件，并要求在本周一之前恢复在巴西的服务。【原文：Elon Musk's social media platform X will file documents requested by Brazil's Supreme Court and ask by this Monday that service be restored in the country, according to two people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 哈里斯表示，她将为新的工会岗位提供税收抵免
item.description: 美国副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）表示，她将为增加 "良好的工会工作 "的公司提供税收减免，就像钢铁行业为宾夕法尼亚州带来的工作一样。【原文：US Vice President Kamala Harris said she would offer tax credits to companies that increase "good union jobs" like the ones that the steel industry brought to Pennsylvania.】
